To prepare this - "BUBBLY EGG MASK" we need.. 
1 egg white in a glass or metal bowl 
1 1/2 tablespoon of sugar.. 
Whisk both with the help of a fork 
Keep whisking until it changes to white thick bubbly foam 
Make sure its really sticky and thick to get the perfect consistency 
while preparing this face mask we need to keep 2 points in consideration... 
First ..Make sure there is no yolk (yellow portion) otherwise it won't bubble the way we want.. 
Secondly..Donâ€™t use plastic bowls 
Use only glass or metal bowls..
